page.title: 19The Thatcher
page.content: One night we went to interview the Georgeham Thatcher, ( Mr Hummerston ) We got quite a lot of information.The reeds come from Devon and Austria and have to be 12_14 inches thick. He thatches round about 8_12 houses a year.You have to be very skilled to do this job,because Mr Hummerston has had an accident,he fell off his ladder. It wasn't very serious though.It is very easy to have an accident when you'r doing a dangerous job like this. I asked him what tools he used he said,a Binder,a reedcomber for shredding the reeds and a hook to help him put the reeds on.Thatching has changed since world war 2,Because the reed wasn't very good,they also used the same tools as we do now.He likes Thatching but the only thing he doesn't like is the weather.
